title.native: 六門天外モンコレナイト

description:
Scientist Ichiroubei Hiiragi discovers the existence of Six Gates, an otherdimensional world full of monsters and powerful hidden treasures known as Mon Mon Items. Ichiroubei embarks with his daughter, Rokuna, and her classmate, Mondo. However, they're foiled at every turn by Count Collection and his assistants, who want the Mon Mon Items in order to conquer both worlds. Becoming the heroes known as Mon Colle Knights, Mondo and Rokuna join forces with the monsters, striking back against Count Collection while searching for the Mon Mon Items in the name of friendship between their worlds.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Six Gates Far Away Mon Colle Knight

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/823822162876170240)

Well-known works include the Sakura Wars franchise. Married to mangaka [Miyuki Kitagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/98586/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/青木康直)

Initially an animator at [Telecom Animation Film](https://anilist.co/studio/94/). Switched to directing in the late '80s.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/823822162876170240)

Well-known works include the Sakura Wars franchise. Married to mangaka [Miyuki Kitagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/98586/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kawasak54965532)

Hiroyuki Kawasaki is a screenwriter and novelist.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/青木康直)

Initially an animator at [Telecom Animation Film](https://anilist.co/studio/94/). Switched to directing in the late '80s.
